basics.label: Kitchen Utility Worker/Evening Weekend Chef
basics.summary: Fast-learning recent CNA graduate, fast-paced, enthusiastic about working in a hospital, adult family home, and/or retirement home. 4+ years experience in patient care, focusing on mentally ill, dementia, Alzheimer, schizophrenic, hospice, and end-of-life care patients.

work.name: Company Name
work.summary: Planned, prepared and served meals and snacks according to prescribed diets. Maintained a clean, orderly and well-stocked environment. Ensured safe conditions within the facility.

work.name: Company Name
work.summary: Observed and documented patient status and reported patient complaints to the case manager. Performed various duties for diagnostic and technical treatment procedures. Provided transportation, assistance, and companionship to clients. Aided with transferring residents. Documented resident records on daily flow sheets. Assisted with ADLs. Provided emotional support to patients and families.

work.name: Company Name
work.summary: Maintained a clean, orderly and well-stocked environment. Participated in the maintenance of safe conditions within the facility. Assisted with ADLs. Documented resident records on daily flow sheets. Recognized and reported changes in patients' health status to nursing staff.

work.name: Company Name
work.summary: Worked with Developmentally Disabled Adults with all ADL's and activities. Observed and documented patient status. Assisted with transferring residents in and out of wheelchairs and adaptive equipment. Assisted with ADLs.

work.name: Company Name
work.summary: Promoted continuity of care by accurately and completely communicating to other caregivers the status of patients. Promoted personal and co-worker safety. Participated in the maintenance of safe conditions within the facility. Maintained a clean, orderly and well-stocked environment. Provided patients and families with emotional support.

work.name: Company Name
work.summary: Observed and documented patient status and reported patient complaints to the case manager. Provided transportation, assistance and companionship to clients. Provided necessary supplies, support, and assistance to medical staff and patients for unit-specific procedures. Assisted with ADLs. Provided patients and families with emotional support.

skills.name: Caregiver Skills
keywords: Effectively interacts with patients and families.
Preparation of healthy meals and snacks
